author: M
title: Basketball: Skyforce & Thunder Cats Win
text:
October 22, 2015 | 0 Comments 
The 2015/16 Cellone Island Basketball League Season continued with a double-header inside the CedarBridge Gymnasium as 219 points were scored on the night. 
Skyforce picked up their first win of the season by defeating the Crossfire Ballers 61- 24 moving them to 1- 2 on the season, while the Crossfire Ballers move to 2- 1 on the new season. Raushon Tankard led all scorers with 19 points for the Skyforce, while Markus Robinson scored 10 points for the Crossfire Ballers. 
The second game saw the Flyboys take on the defending champions Thunder Cats, with the champs prevailing with a win 63- 61 and going 2- 1 on the season, while the Flyboys recorded their first loss and are now 2- 1 on the season. Chris Crumpler scored 18 points for the Thunder Cats, while Akil Smith led all the scorers with 21 points for the Flyboys. Related Stories
